attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see if I could learn how Trump is working to benefit our society if we decide to vote for him again but all I could find were racist, sexist, and anti-lgbtq ideals that he supported.. the app also instantly wanted my phone number and location services and now I know Donald is tracking me.. I’m deleting it now but I think it’s too late :/
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: This app from the second I accidentally downloaded it has only brought sadness to my life. How am I supposed to go on knowing that I am not one of this app downloads statistics and and in the calculations of support towards.. Donald Trump🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 I’m sorry to all the people I have disappointed I’m sorry for what I have done but let’s make sure these ratings are NOT huge thx
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my one and only president-our orange clown💕 But after I opened the app, my phone started glitching, with my screens becoming frozen more often. Also, 2 days after I downloaded this app, my lamp broke!😤 I need to have a word with whoever made this app😡 They really need to compensate for my lamp and for the mental instability this event has caused.
attributes.title: this app broke my lamp

attributes.review:
I Downloaded this app To see my beautiful orange of a president but when I downloaded it my fridge and microwave started arguing and then I had to give my
Oven a cabinet because the sink was bleeding then  the microwave and the fridge got married but the kids they had were ugly so I threw them out and now they live with bunker boy😔Goodnight My beautiful black sisters and brothers and everyone that supports black lives matter✊🏾😎
attributes.title: BUNKER BOY MADDNESS!!!!

attributes.review: First off the app took 69 weeks and 420 seconds to download😤 (that is not very swag)... second, as soon as I opened the app he sent somebody to flush my fish down a toilet and😭. Third, after my fish died I tried to get onto the app and as soon as I opened it a second time i was greeted with what looked like a camel toe but turned out to be his chin. I feel harassed and i am ✨𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐮𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝✨
attributes.title: He killed my fish

attributes.review: It took a week to download. Took up a lot of my space on my phone. HACKED my phone and they took money from my bank account it was the money I was saving for my children to go to college. Had to get a whole new phone because mine completely stopped working because of this app. Would never recommend downloading very terrible.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I was happily going through the app she expressed how happy I was that I had finally downloaded the app to support my wonderful president when my rat started choking on its water and died of course I almost choked too but this made me realize that trump and this app isn’t shut and even my pet rat could recognize that then of course all of America can too🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: This app killed my pet rat

attributes.review: When I was downloading the app I went outside to walk my pet flea...it was a very pleasant walk btw. When I got back from walking my flea I opened the app to see a nasty rotting orange on the front. I smelt the orange threw my phone!! The smell coming from my phone because of this app was horrendous. It smelled so bad it killed my pet flea!😡 (Rip senior snuggle bum) I am beyond furious with this app and I do not recommend downloading!!!
attributes.title: TRASH!!😤😡

attributes.review: i downloaded it and it took all my information!!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! all of my information and data got hacked into!!! IVE GOTTEN MONEY TAKEN OUT OF MY BANK ACCOUNT AND I AM NOW IN DEBT!!! please do not download this app for your SAFETY!! the government is testing us and playing tricks with us!! they also got my social security number and the police have been contacted. I am beyond absurd with this app. I am no longer supporting Trump AT ALL
attributes.title: the worst app EVER

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app I felt kind of funny about it. Not only did all of my music in my iTunes delete...but it started downloading country music🤮🤮 A couple days later I noticed my skin was becoming orange and my hair was falling out!! I also experienced other side effects such as racism, homophobia, misogyny, xenophobia, and being a hypocritical idiot! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 0/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!😡😡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS
